snippet.title: Mummy's Curse walkthrough (Apple II - Highlands Computers Inc.)
snippet.description:
You are an adventurer on a quest to recover the solid gold death mask of King Ruttatuttut, which is guarded by a mummy.

Mummy's Curse (http://gue.cgwmuseum.org/galleries/index.php?pub=5&item=26&id=2&key=0) was a graphics adventure game published by Highlands Computers Inc. in 1981 for the Apple ][.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - www.
